结构

点击空白处关闭
原密码：
新密码：
确认新密码：
新密码不能是123456 
<button id='normal'>定位pop</button>点击空白处关闭
<div id='content' style="display: none">
  <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="tablePopB tableItemC">
    <tbody><tr>
      <th>原密码：</th>
      <td><input type="password" id="oldPassword" class="inputTex" name=""></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <th>新密码：</th>
      <td><input type="password" id="newPassword" class="inputTex" name=""></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <th>确认新密码：</th>
      <td><input type="password" id="confirmNewPassword" class="inputTex" name=""></td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td colspan="2" class="tableBot"><input type="submit" class="bthBlueOper mgL10" value="修改">
        <input type="reset" class="bthBlueOper mgL10" value="重置">
        <span>新密码不能是123456</span></td>
    </tr>
  </tbody></table>
</div>
